021import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
022import net.tnemc.core.currency.CurrencyLoader;
023import net.tnemc.core.currency.CurrencySaver;
024import net.tnemc.core.currency.CurrencyType;
025import net.tnemc.core.currency.item.ItemCurrency;
026import net.tnemc.core.currency.item.ItemDenomination;
027import net.tnemc.core.currency.loader.DefaultCurrencyLoader;
028import net.tnemc.core.currency.parser.MoneyParser;
029import net.tnemc.core.currency.parser.ParseRule;
030import net.tnemc.core.currency.saver.DefaultCurrencySaver;
031import net.tnemc.core.currency.type.ExperienceLevelType;
032import net.tnemc.core.currency.type.ExperienceType;
033import net.tnemc.core.currency.type.ItemType;
034import net.tnemc.core.currency.type.MixedType;
035import net.tnemc.core.currency.type.VirtualType;
036import net.tnemc.core.utils.MISCUtils;
037import net.tnemc.core.utils.exceptions.NoValidCurrenciesException;
038import net.tnemc.item.AbstractItemStack;
039import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
040import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.log.DebugLevel;
041import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.utils.IOUtil;
042import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
043import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
044
045import java.io.File;
046import java.math.BigDecimal;
047import java.util.ArrayList;
048import java.util.Collection;
049import java.util.HashMap;
050import java.util.LinkedList;
051import java.util.Map;
052import java.util.Optional;
053import java.util.UUID;
054
055/**
056 * CurrencyManager
057 *
058 * @author creatorfromhell
059 * @since 0.1.2.0
060 */
061public class CurrencyManager {
062
063  public static final BigDecimal largestSupported = new BigDecimal("900000000000000000000000000000000000000000000");
064
065  private final Map<UUID, Currency> currencies = new HashMap<>();
066  private final Map<String, UUID> curIDMap = new HashMap<>();
067  private final Map<String, CurrencyType> types = new HashMap<>();
068
069  private CurrencyLoader loader = new DefaultCurrencyLoader();
070  private CurrencySaver saver = new DefaultCurrencySaver();
071
072  private MoneyParser parser = new MoneyParser();
073
074  private boolean retry = false;
075
076  public CurrencyManager() {
077
078    addType(new ExperienceType());
079    addType(new ExperienceLevelType());
080    addType(new ItemType());
081    addType(new MixedType());
082    addType(new VirtualType());
083  }
084
085  public boolean load(final File parent) {
086
087    return load(parent, true);
088  }
089
090  public boolean load(final File parent, final boolean reset) {
091
092    if(reset) {
093      currencies.clear();
094      curIDMap.clear();
095    }
096
097    try {
098      loader.loadCurrencies(new File(parent, "currency"));
099    } catch(final NoValidCurrenciesException ignore) {
100      if(retry) {
101        PluginCore.log().error("No valid currencies found and failed to create USD defaults! Disabling plugin. Configure your currencies properly then retry!", DebugLevel.OFF);
102        return false;
103      }
104
105      PluginCore.log().error("No valid currencies found, attempting to create and load USD defaults.", DebugLevel.OFF);
106
107      //Save our default currency file
108      final File cur = new File(PluginCore.directory(), "currency");
109
110      final int count = (cur.exists())? IOUtil.getYAMLs(cur).length : 0;
111      if(!cur.exists()) {
112        final boolean created = cur.mkdir();
113        if(!created) {
114          PluginCore.log().error("Failed to create plugin currency directory. Disabling plugin.", DebugLevel.OFF);
115          return false;
116        }
117        if(count == 0) {
118          PluginCore.server().saveResource("currency/USD.yml", false);
119        }
120      }
121
122      final File usd = new File(cur, "USD");
123      if(count == 0 && !usd.exists()) {
124        final boolean created = usd.mkdir();
125        if(!created) {
126          PluginCore.log().error("Failed to create plugin USD currency directory. Disabling plugin.", DebugLevel.OFF);
127          return false;
128        }
129        PluginCore.server().saveResource("currency/USD/one.yml", false);
130        PluginCore.server().saveResource("currency/USD/penny.yml", false);
131      }
132      this.retry = true;
133      return load(parent, reset);
134    }
135    return true;
136  }
137
138  /**
139   * Saves all currency UUIDs only.
140   *
141   * @param parent The directory used for saving.
142   */
143  public void saveCurrenciesUUID(final File parent) {
144
145    saver.saveCurrenciesUUID(new File(parent, "currency"));
146  }
147
148  public CurrencyLoader getLoader() {
149
150    return loader;
151  }
152
153  public void setLoader(final CurrencyLoader loader) {
154
155    this.loader = loader;
156  }
157
158  public CurrencySaver getSaver() {
159
160    return saver;
161  }
162
163  public void setSaver(final CurrencySaver saver) {
164
165    this.saver = saver;
166  }
167
168  /**
169   * Used to add a currency.
170   *
171   * @param currency The currency to add.
172   */
173  public void addCurrency(final Currency currency) {
174
175    currencies.put(currency.getUid(), currency);
176    curIDMap.put(currency.getIdentifier(), currency.getUid());
177  }
178
179  /**
180   * Used to get the default currency. This could be the default currency for the server globally or
181   * for the default world if the implementation supports multi-world.
182   *
183   * @return The currency that is the default for the server if multi-world support is not available
184   * otherwise the default for the default world.
185   *
186   * @since 0.1.2.0
187   */
188  @NotNull
189  public Currency defaultCurrency() {
190
191    for(final Currency currency : currencies.values()) {
192      if(currency.isGlobalDefault()) {
193        return currency;
194      }
195    }
196    return currencies.values().iterator().next();
197  }
198
199  /**
200   * Used to get the default currency for the specified world if this implementation has multi-world
201   * support, otherwise the default currency for the server.
202   *
203   * @param region The region to get the default currency for. This could be a world, biomes, or a
204   *               third party based region.
205   *
206   * @return The default currency for the specified world if this implementation has multi-world
207   * support, otherwise the default currency for the server.
208   *
209   * @since 0.1.2.0
210   */
211  @NotNull
212  public Currency defaultCurrency(@NotNull final String region) {
213
214    for(final Currency currency : currencies.values()) {
215      if(currency.isRegionDefault(region)) {
216        return currency;
217      }
218    }
219    return defaultCurrency();
220  }
221
222  /**
223   * Used to get a set of every {@link Currency} object that is available in the specified world if
224   * this implementation has multi-world support, otherwise all {@link Currency} objects for the
225   * server.
226   *
227   * @param region The region to get the currencies for. This could be a world, biomes, or a third
228   *               party based region.
229   *
230   * @return A set of every {@link Currency} object that is available in the specified world if this
231   * implementation has multi-world support, otherwise all {@link Currency} objects for the server.
232   *
233   * @since 0.1.2.0
234   */
235  public Collection<Currency> getCurrencies(@NotNull final String region) {
236
237    final Collection<Currency> regionCurrencies = new ArrayList<>();
238
239    for(final Currency currency : currencies.values()) {
240      if(currency.regionEnabled(region)) {
241        regionCurrencies.add(currency);
242      }
243    }
244    return regionCurrencies;
245  }
246
247  /**
248   * Used to find a {@link Currency currency} based on its unique identifier.
249   *
250   * @param identifier The identifier to look for.
251   *
252   * @return An Optional containing the currency if it exists, otherwise an empty Optional.
253   */
254  public Optional<Currency> find(final UUID identifier) {
255
256    return Optional.ofNullable(currencies.get(identifier));
257  }
258
259  /**
260   * Used to find a {@link Currency currency} based on an item.
261   *
262   * @param item The item to use for this search.
263   *
264   * @return An Optional containing the currency if this item is a valid currency item, otherwise an
265   * empty Optional.
266   */
267  public Optional<Currency> findByItem(final AbstractItemStack<?> item) {
268
269    for(final Currency currency : currencies.values()) {
270
271      if(currency instanceof ItemCurrency) {
272
273        final Optional<ItemDenomination> denom = ((ItemCurrency)currency).getDenominationByMaterial(item.material());
274        if(denom.isPresent()) {
275          return Optional.of(currency);
276        }
277      }
278    }
279    return Optional.empty();
280  }
281
282  /**
283   * Used to find a {@link Currency currency} based on a material.
284   *
285   * @param material The material to use for this search.
286   *
287   * @return An Optional containing the currency if this item is a valid currency item, otherwise an
288   * empty Optional.
289   */
290  public Optional<Currency> findCurrencyByMaterial(final String material) {
291
292    for(final Currency currency : currencies.values()) {
293
294      if(currency instanceof ItemCurrency) {
295
296        final Optional<ItemDenomination> denom = ((ItemCurrency)currency).getDenominationByMaterial(material);
297        if(denom.isPresent()) {
298          return Optional.of(currency);
299        }
300      }
301    }
302    return Optional.empty();
303  }
304
305  /**
306   * Finds a Currency object based on the symbol provided.
307   *
308   * @param symbol The symbol of the currency to search for.
309   *
310   * @return An Optional containing the Currency object if found, otherwise an empty Optional.
311   */
312  public Optional<Currency> findCurrencyBySymbol(@Nullable final String symbol) {
313
314    if(symbol == null) {
315
316      return Optional.empty();
317    }
318
319    for(final Currency currency : currencies.values()) {
320
321      if(currency.getSymbol().equalsIgnoreCase(symbol)) {
322
323        return Optional.of(currency);
324      }
325    }
326    return Optional.empty();
327  }
328
329  /**
330   * Used to find a {@link Currency currency} based on its user-friendly identifier.
331   *
332   * @param identifier The identifier to look for.
333   *
334   * @return An Optional containing the currency if it exists, otherwise an empty Optional.
335   */
336  public Optional<Currency> find(final String identifier) {
337
338    try {
339
340      return Optional.ofNullable(currencies.get(UUID.fromString(identifier)));
341    } catch(final Exception ignore) {
342
343      for(final Map.Entry<String, UUID> entry : curIDMap.entrySet()) {
344
345        if(entry.getKey().equalsIgnoreCase(identifier)) {
346
347          return Optional.ofNullable(currencies.get(entry.getValue()));
348        }
349      }
350      return Optional.empty();
351    }
352  }
353
354  /**
355   * Used to find a {@link Currency currency} based on its user-friendly identifier.
356   *
357   * @param identifier The identifier to look for.
358   *
359   * @return An Optional containing the currency if it exists, otherwise an empty Optional.
360   */
361  public Currency findOrDefault(final String identifier) {
362
363    try {
364
365      return findOrDefault(UUID.fromString(identifier));
366    } catch(final Exception ignore) {
367
368      for(final Map.Entry<String, UUID> entry : curIDMap.entrySet()) {
369
370        if(entry.getKey().equalsIgnoreCase(identifier)) {
371
372          return currencies.get(entry.getValue());
373        }
374      }
375      return defaultCurrency();
376    }
377  }
378
379  /**
380   * Used to find a {@link Currency currency} based on its {@link UUID identifier}, or a new
381   * Currency object if the specified identifier doesn't exist.
382   *
383   * @param identifier The identifier to look for.
384   *
385   * @return The currency object if found; Otherwise a new currency object.
386   */
387  public Currency findOrDefault(final UUID identifier) {
388
389    return findOrDefault(identifier, false);
390  }
391
392  /**
393   * Used to find a {@link Currency currency} based on its {@link UUID identifier}, or a new
394   * Currency object if the specified identifier doesn't exist.
395   *
396   * @param identifier The identifier to look for.
397   * @param item       True if this should return an {@link ItemCurrency} object if the specified
398   *                   identifier doesn't exist.
399   *
400   * @return The currency object if found; Otherwise a new currency object.
401   */
402  public Currency findOrDefault(final UUID identifier, final boolean item) {
403
404    if(identifier != null && currencies.containsKey(identifier)) {
405      return currencies.get(identifier);
406    }
407
408    final String curID = MISCUtils.randomString(3);
409    if(item) return new ItemCurrency(curID);
410    return new Currency(curID);
411  }
412
413  public LinkedList<Currency> currencies() {
414
415    return new LinkedList<>(currencies.values());
416  }
417
418  public Map<String, CurrencyType> getTypes() {
419
420    return types;
421  }
422
423  /**
424   * Used to add a currency type.
425   *
426   * @param type The currency type to add.
427   */
428  public void addType(final CurrencyType type) {
429
430    types.put(type.name(), type);
431  }
432
433  /**
434   * Used to find a currency type based on its identifier.
435   *
436   * @param identifier The identifier to look for.
437   *
438   * @return An Optional containing the currency type if it exists, otherwise an empty Optional.
439   */
440  public Optional<CurrencyType> findType(final String identifier) {
441
442    return Optional.ofNullable(types.get(identifier));
443  }
444
445  public CurrencyType findTypeOrDefault(final String identifier) {
446
447    return types.getOrDefault(identifier, types.get("virtual"));
448  }
449
450  public MoneyParser parser() {
451
452    return parser;
453  }
454
455  /**
456   * Adds a ParseRule to the parser for applying rules during parsing.
457   *
458   * @param rule The ParseRule object to add for parsing.
459   */
460  public void addParseRule(final ParseRule rule) {
461
462    parser.addRule(rule);
463  }
464
465  public Map<String, UUID> getCurIDMap() {
466
467    return curIDMap;
468  }
469
470  public Map<UUID, Currency> getCurrencies() {
471
472    return currencies;
473  }
474
475  public void delete(final UUID uid) {
476
477    if(currencies.containsKey(uid)) {
478      //TODO: Delete files.
479    }
480    currencies.remove(uid);
481  }
482}
